name: Generic MCP Example
description: An example integration demonstrating how to create a generic (MCP) tool that can be used by AI agents to search for people in an external CRM system.

name: Process Large Files
description: Process large files efficiently using Node.js streams.

name: Shared Endpoint Example
description: An example integration demonstrating the use of shared webhook endpoints.

name: Salesforce
description: Create a field mapping between Salesforce objects and your system and leverage Salesforce workflows to sync data bidirectionally.

name: Salesforce MCP Example
description: An example integration demonstrating how to create a Salesforce-specific (MCP) tool that can be used by AI agents to search for contacts in Salesforce.

name: Slack
description: Send messages to Slack channels based on data from external systems, with dynamic channel selection and scheduling.
